name: Sneak In - Downloadable version (.exe)
description:
Sneak In is a game based on stealth and timing. You want to learn how to read, but you are a cat. The pros? There’s a girl reading her poems in her room on the top floor of the building. The cons? This building hates cats. Good luck.

This is the demo level, and it's still under development. Thank you for supporting!
